section.heading: Potomac water to be furnished to charitable institutions without charge.

annotations.annotation: April 18, 1996, D.C. Law 11-111, title III, § 306, 43 DCR 548

Repeal effective 90 days after meeting of Board: Section 306 of D.C. Law 11-111 repealed this section. However, § 601 of D.C. Law 11-111 provided that title III of the act shall apply 90 days after the initial meeting of the Board established by section 204 of the act.
